name: Pterosaur Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Pterosaur combines classic mining and nft applications in order to make the Pter token a community-backed, steadily growing token, which is our team's original intention and mission

What makes your project unique?
Pterosaur is creating a project to combine DeFi and Meta-Universe technologies to provide users with highly profitable, easy and fun experiences on Web3.

History of your project.
We built the team in 2022 and planned the initial roadmap for the project, and in 2023 we opened the website and went live with the tokens

What’s next for your project?
 · More marketing partnerships 
 · Cross-chain expansions 
 · More pools integration 
 · Modular development components 
 · Official Game Launch 
 · Synthetic assets and derivative trading

What can your token be used for?
Pterosaur has created a number of interesting NFTs, and different levels of NFTs require different amounts of $PTER tokens to purchase. 
By purchasing and pledging NFTs, users can earn more $PTER and also help to increase the circulation value of the token.
Pterosaur is also developing a DeFi card game where players can use their NFTs as game assets and compete to win $PTER rewards. 
The game will be based on the comprehensive ability value of NFTs, and the winner will receive $PTER rewards.

description.no:
What is the project about?
Pterosaur combines classic mining and nft applications in order to make the Pter token a community-backed, steadily growing token, which is our team's original intention and mission

What makes your project unique?
Pterosaur is creating a project to combine DeFi and Meta-Universe technologies to provide users with highly profitable, easy and fun experiences on Web3.

History of your project.
We built the team in 2022 and planned the initial roadmap for the project, and in 2023 we opened the website and went live with the tokens

What’s next for your project?
 · More marketing partnerships 
 · Cross-chain expansions 
 · More pools integration 
 · Modular development components 
 · Official Game Launch 
 · Synthetic assets and derivative trading

What can your token be used for?
Pterosaur has created a number of interesting NFTs, and different levels of NFTs require different amounts of $PTER tokens to purchase. 
By purchasing and pledging NFTs, users can earn more $PTER and also help to increase the circulation value of the token.
Pterosaur is also developing a DeFi card game where players can use their NFTs as game assets and compete to win $PTER rewards. 
The game will be based on the comprehensive ability value of NFTs, and the winner will receive $PTER rewards.
